overview:
## Discussion

Use a `.search` default item kind with `DefaultToolbarItem/init(kind:placment:)` to customize the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ToolbarItemPlacement] of a default item kind. The search default item kind can be placed in the `.bottomBar` on iPhone only. All available platforms support `.topBarTrailing` and `.automatic`.

# search

**Type Property**

The search item added by a `View/searchable(text:isPresented:placement:prompt)` modifier.

## Declaration

```swift
static let search: ToolbarDefaultItemKind
```

## Discussion

Use a `.search` default item kind with `DefaultToolbarItem/init(kind:placment:)` to customize the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ToolbarItemPlacement] of a default item kind. The search default item kind can be placed in the `.bottomBar` on iPhone only. All available platforms support `.topBarTrailing` and `.automatic`.
title: search
